message: Fair 60-40 split. Accept and let's be friends!
Your turn! How about a slight adjustment for a more even split? Time is ticking...
Meet me in the middle, 57.5-42.5 split. Don't let inflation eat our money!
Okay, splitting the difference again.  We need to agree soon!
Come on, Bob! 56.25-43.75 is more than fair. Inflation is killing us!
Alice, we're running out of time!  This is a tiny concession - let's seal the deal!
